SELECT MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID,

MS_SI_MENJOU.NAME AS MENJOU_NAME
FROM MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND
JOIN MS_SI_MENJOU ON MS_SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID
WHERE MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID,
MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID,
MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.NAME, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.NAME_ABBR, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.SHOW_ORDER,
MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.DATA_NO, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.USER_KEY, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.TS,
MS_SI_MENJOU.NAME AS MENJOU_NAME
FROM MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND
JOIN MS_SI_MENJOU ON MS_SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID
WHERE MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_ID

MS_SI_MENJOU_ID ,
NAME , NAME_ABBR , SHOW_ORDER ,
